source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_00<tab>Gaia appears to be conversing with the voice inside her head.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_00<tab>無の大地のガイアは、「妖精」の声を聞いたようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_01<tab>You and Ryne can only look on in worry as Gaia is overcome by another assault on her senses caused by the voice in her head. Thankfully, this troubling episode ends as suddenly as it began, though she is left with the lingering notion of using Darkness to restore the Empty. Ryne soon realizes that this may indeed provide a means by which to revitalize the withered flora. It seems that the Light's influence on the ambient aether is still too strong to allow life to flourish, and shifting the alignment closer to Darkness should redress the balance. The three of you make your way to Eden's core to put your theories to the test.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_01<tab>ガイアと話した。無の大地に芽吹いた緑は、光が暴走した影響で、枯れてしまったようだ。闇属性の励起を行えば、光を相殺できるかもしれない。エデンコアの「リーン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_02In order to restore balance to the aether, you must call upon the image of an entity embodying Darkness. As you have no experience fighting primals of that nature, your memories of the Cloud of Darkness, ruler among voidsent, will instead form the basis for the summoning.

※Eden's Promise: Umbra can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_02リーンと話した。闇属性の励起を行うにあたり、倒すべき相手は暗闇の雲だ。しっかりと準備を整えて、疑似妖異召喚を行い、現れた暗闇の雲を討滅しよう！

※コンテンツファインダーから攻略に参加できます。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_03<tab>With Ryne and Gaia working in harmony to manipulate the ambient aether, the plan to call forth a likeness of the Cloud of Darkness is a success. Naturally, you rise to the occasion and slay the beast, returning its aether to the Empty. Gaia is keen to return to the camp to observe whether your efforts have yielded the desired results.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_03<tab>暗闇の雲を討滅し、闇属性を励起した。エデンコアの「ガイア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_04<tab>Much to your dismay, the once-verdant foliage is no closer to being rejuvenated. However, the strangely shifting hues of the crystal that towers above indicate that something has changed...be it for good or ill.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SEQ_04<tab>ガイアと話した。闇属性の励起には成功したが、無の大地の緑はまだ枯れたままのようだ。しかし環境エーテルになんらかの変化が生じていることは間違いない。さらなる調査に取りかかろう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ryne in Eden's core.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_TODO_00<tab>エデンコアのリーンと話す
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_TODO_01<tab>「希望の園エデン：再生編1」を攻略

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_000<tab>It's been so long since Gaia had one of her headaches that I thought the faerie might've disappeared for good. Do you think it's got something to do with Eden?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_000「妖精」の声、今までおさまっていたのに……。
やっぱり、エデンに近づいたからでしょうか？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_012<tab>Restore the Darkness...to the world flooded by Light...

TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_014<tab>We thought we'd restored balance to the six elements, but perhaps they're still too strongly aligned with Light? If that's the case, maybe we can set things right by using Darkness.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_014ねぇ、光属性が励起されてしまったのなら、
今度は闇属性を励起させたらどうかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_015<tab>By using Darkness? Are...are you serious!?
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_016<tab>But hold on... It might actually work!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_016そうか……励起にはバランスが大事。
光属性が強すぎるなら、相反する関係にある、
闇属性を励起させればいい……！？

TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_017ガイア冴えてる！
それならきっとうまくいきそう！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_018<tab>I-I wouldn't go that far. I just remembered what I learned during our adventures, that's all.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_018前回の作戦だって、最初はうまくいかなかったでしょう？
私もみんなを見習って、ポジティブに考えてみただけよ。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_019<tab>But this does mean we'll need to call on your services again, if that's all right with you?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_019)) (( )) 02 /var>には、
また蛮神の討滅をお願いすることになるけどね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_020<tab>We've come this far together, and we'll see our mission to the end! To Eden's core!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_020まだ希望の芽は摘まれていません。
エデンコアに向かい、闇属性の励起を行いましょう！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_030<tab>I'll say one thing before we start: if this all goes horribly wrong, don't even think about pinning it on me! Not that it will, of course...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_030作戦の指針を決めるって、結構責任重大ね。
これでダメだったら……なんて考えても仕方ないし、
今は目の前のことに集中するわ。
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_040<tab>それでは、闇属性の励起を始めたいと思います！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_041<tab>But...hmmm... Were there any primals aligned with Darkness? I can't seem to recall any...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_041しかし、その……
闇属性の蛮神って、いるんでしょうか？
以前、予習した中には、含まれていなかった気がします……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_043<tab>The Ascians' god, Zodiark, may be suitable, but we need something that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has actually encountered─and preferably defeated.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_043強いて言えば、闇の使徒たるアシエンたちが呼び降ろした、
ゾディアークが、それにあたるのかと。
でも、かつて戦い勝利した相手でなければ想像できませんし……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_044<tab>Well, does it have to be a primal for it to work? If it's just a lot of Darkness that we need, perhaps there are other ways to get it.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_044励起に必要なのは、属性のもっとも活発な状態、
ってことだったじゃない？
だったら、別に蛮神じゃなくてもいいんじゃないかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_045<tab>You may be right! What we ultimately need is a state of highly charged Darkness─it shouldn't matter what form it takes. Does anything come to mind, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_045そっか！
闇属性がもっとも活発な状態について、
ほかに心当たりがあれば……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_A1_000_001<tab>I daresay the Flood of Darkness had a fair bit of...Darkness.
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_A1_000_002<tab>I know a few voidsent that would fit the bill.
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_046<tab>You mean the catastrophe that swallowed the Thirteenth and turned it into a lifeless void? Erm, we might need something on a slightly smaller scale...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_046闇の氾濫というと、
たしか第十三世界という異世界を滅ぼした災厄でしたよね。
そうか、闇属性の力が溢れていたのなら……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_047<tab>The creatures I unleashed while under the faerie's control... If we were able to summon one powerful enough, it just might work.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_047それってたしか……「妖精」に操られた私が、
空間を切り裂いて呼び寄せてた、ってヤツよね？
じゃあ、それらを束ねる最強のヤツを呼べばいいのかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_048<tab>The Cloud of Darkness... I can't begin to imagine how powerful it must have been.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_048)) (( )) 02 /var>さんたちの世界をも無に還そうとした、
魔王級の妖異、「暗闇の雲」……。
そんなものとまで、戦ったことがあるんですか！？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_049<tab>I'd say we've found the perfect candidate.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_049<tab>励起には、うってつけの存在ね！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_050<tab>But where to find a suitable place, one where Darkness is strong... It won't be easy in a world flooded by Light.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_050ああ……でも、場所はどうしましょう？
この世界で、もっとも闇と関わりが深い場所。
それがわからなければ、励起が行えません……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_051<tab>Well, we've got the Warrior of Darkness <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> the Oracle of Darkness right here. It seems like a good enough spot to me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_051闇が強い場所、ねぇ……。
……闇の戦士と闇の巫女がいるんだから、
ここじゃないかしら？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_052<tab>But what about the Light-aligned aether that's all around us?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_052ここ！？　いくらふたりの闇が強くても、
光が溢れてしまっている現状を、
先になんとかしなきゃ、どうにもならないんじゃ……？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_053<tab>That's where you come in. You can suppress the Light while I draw out the Darkness. By combining our powers, we can make it work wherever we are.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_053それは、リーンがいるじゃない。
アナタが光を抑えて、私が闇を増幅させる。
ふたりで力を合わせて、属性の励起を行うの！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_055<tab>Yes, between us, there's nothing we can't achieve! Don't be afraid, Gaia!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_055……それ、いい！
ひとりじゃダメでも、ふたりならやれる！
恐れることなんてない！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_056<tab>I'm not afraid─just very concerned that this will all go horribly wrong...which is the same thing, I suppose. Anyway, it's certainly not easy coming up with these plans by ourselves.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_056それにしても……
全部自分たちで考えてやらなきゃいけないって、
思ってた以上に大変ね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_057<tab>That's true. But when this is over, we can reward ourselves with all sorts of delicious treats at the festival!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_057フフッ、その代わり、作戦が終わったら、
自分たちへのご褒美として、お祭りを思いっきり楽しもう？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_059<tab>We spoke about it on the way here, remember? I asked if you wanted to take part.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_059ほら、さっきホバー船の中で話したでしょ？
水晶祭の実行委員を、一緒にやろうって。
甘いお菓子とか、たくさん食べられるといいね。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_060<tab>Um... I was busy piloting the skyslipper, so I probably wasn't paying attention.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_060ああ……ごめん、ちょっと運転に集中してたから。
あんまりちゃんと聞いてなかったかも……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_061<tab>Oh well, not to worry. We can talk about that later. Right now we've got a job to do!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_061じゃあ、その話はまたあとで。
さっそく、闇属性の励起に取りかかりましょう！
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_062<tab>環境エーテルを停滞から解放し……。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_063<tab>And I'll shift its alignment to Darkness!

target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_064)) (( )) 02 /var>さん、現れるべき妖異のイメージを！
よろしくお願いします……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>Memories of the Cloud of Darkness enshroud your mind...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_SYSTEM_000_065闇の荒々しき姿……
暗闇の雲との激闘を、強く想起した……！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_070<tab>This is the first time we've tried this since that disaster with Shiva, so I'd be lying if I said I wasn't nervous. Even so, I can't afford to waver now!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_070前回は私が言いだして、憑依型の神降ろしをしましたが、
不安が少しもなかったと言えばウソになります……。
でも今は、安心して励起に臨めます！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_071<tab>I've called forth real voidsent before─so everyone tells me, anyway─but this is unknown territory for me. With the two of you by my side, though, I'm sure it'll work!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_071疑似神降ろしならぬ、疑似妖異召喚か……。
闇の力を少しは制御できるようになったんだもの、
やってやろうじゃない！

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_080<tab>So that was what a world flooded by Darkness would look like...
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_080闇の氾濫に呑まれた世界……。
私たちの世界も、光の氾濫に呑まれてしまっていたら、
あんな風になってしまっていたんでしょうか……？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_090<tab>That all went surprisingly well. Of course, we have <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> to thank for slaying that ghastly creature.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_090疑似妖異召喚……なんとかうまくいったみたいね。
)) (( )) 02 /var>も、討滅おつかれさま。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_091<tab>You were fantastic, Gaia! Anyone would think you're an old hand at this!
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_RYNE_000_091やったね、ガイア！
闇の力、バッチリ制御できてるじゃない。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_092<tab>You weren't so bad yourself. We make quite a team, don't we?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_092リーンがサポートしてくれたからよ。
私たち、いいコンビじゃない？

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_094<tab>I don't know about you two, but I'm itching to see whether our hard work has paid off. Let's head back.
target: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_094<tab>それじゃ、さっそく「無の大地」の様子を見に行きましょう。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_100<tab>Hmm... The plants are just as lifeless as they were before. Maybe the Light's influence is still too strong?
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_100……枯れたまま、ね。
闇属性を励起させれば、溢れた光を相殺できると思ったのに。
光が強すぎるのかしら？

source:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_102In fleeting hues and endless warmth,
A gentle light washed over me.
target:
TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_102その光は、まばたくたびに色を変え、
瞳の奥に焼き付けた。

source: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_103<tab>A glimmer of hope once lost...
target: TEXT_LUCKRA302_03976_GAIA_000_103<tab>かつて失われた、鮮やかな景色を……。
